competitor_analysis.tagline: Data Control and Audience Targeting for Advertisers
competitor_analysis.mission: Empowers advertisers and agencies to take control of their data and target any audience on any platform

services.name: Audience Builder
services.description: Build custom audiences from 280M+ US consumer profiles and 60B+ weekly behavioral data points
benefits: Target precise audiences beyond platform limitations

services.name: SuperPixel
services.description: Advanced website visitor identification technology that matches traffic to real profiles
features: Match up to 80% of website visitors
Integration with CRMs and ad platforms
benefits: Capture 75% more data than standard pixels

services.name: Data Enrichment
services.description: Enhance existing data with verified contact information and behavioral attributes

services.name: Data as a Service (DAAS)
services.description: Subscription model for agencies to access and resell verified audience data

services.name: Cross-Platform Activation
services.description: Sync audiences to any advertising platform or marketing tool

services.name: Behavioral Analysis
services.description: AI-powered analysis of 60 billion URLs and behaviors weekly
features: Custom AI models for audience analysis

services.name: B2B2C Linkage
services.description: Connect business data with individual consumer profiles

platform_capabilities: Custom AI models for audience creation
value_propositions: Take control of your data away from walled gardens
Target any audience on any platform
case_study_results: Reduced cost per booked call from $400 to $190
50% reduction in opt-in costs within 24 hours
competitor_analysis.pricing_insights: No public pricing available - operates on demo/consultation model. Likely enterprise/custom pricing based on data usage and features. DAAS model suggests subscription-based pricing for agencies.

senova_opportunity.positioning: Affordable audience intelligence platform for medical aesthetics
senova_opportunity.differentiation: Lower pricing with specialized focus on medical aesthetics and healthcare marketing

services_to_offer.name: MedSpa Audience Builder
services_to_offer.description: Build targeted audiences for medical spas and aesthetic clinics
services_to_offer.focus: High-value patients interested in cosmetic procedures
features: Target by procedure interest (Botox, fillers, laser treatments)

services_to_offer.name: Patient Identification Pixel
services_to_offer.description: Identify website visitors interested in aesthetic treatments
services_to_offer.focus: Convert anonymous traffic into patient leads

services_to_offer.name: Healthcare Data Enrichment
services_to_offer.description: Enhance patient records with verified contact and demographic data

services_to_offer.name: Multi-Location Practice Management
services_to_offer.description: Data solutions for medical practices with multiple locations

services_to_offer.name: Treatment Campaign Activation
services_to_offer.description: Launch targeted campaigns across all marketing channels
services_to_offer.focus: Promote specific treatments to qualified audiences

services_to_offer.name: Competitor Patient Acquisition
services_to_offer.description: Identify and target patients visiting competitor websites

services_to_offer.name: ROI Analytics Dashboard
services_to_offer.description: Track patient acquisition costs and lifetime value
services_to_offer.focus: Prove marketing ROI for medical practices

senova_opportunity.pricing_strategy: Position at 40-60% below AudienceLab pricing with transparent, tiered pricing model. Focus on SMB medical practices that can't afford enterprise solutions.
key_differentiators: Industry-specific case studies and ROI calculators
go_to_market: Content marketing focused on patient acquisition
Integration partnerships with practice management software

key_insights: AudienceLab is positioned as an enterprise solution with complex features
Heavy focus on agencies rather than direct businesses
No transparent pricing creates opportunity for Senova
Platform requires technical expertise to fully utilize
Case studies show strong ROI potential in this market
